The Prestige 1
contents.description: JW Tasting 12 YR   1oz x 3

contents.text: Yamazaki 12 yr - pleasant floral character, tropical fruit, sweet finish & winter spice
Hibiki 12 yr - crushed almonds, stewed fruits, clove studded oranges & crisp apple
Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 yr - note of plum jam, cut herbs, floral, vanilla ice cream & cold coffee

contents.name: The Prestige 2
contents.description: JW Tasting 12 YR  1oz x 3

contents.text: Nikka Coffey Grain - rich, soft, sweet flavors and a hint of vanilla wafer w/honey finish
Miyagikyo Single Malt 12 yr - mature sweetness & richness but soft smooth tang of palate
Yoichi Single Malt 15 yr - rich & spiced w/notes of crisp orchard fruits, anise & cream
